import { setMaxListeners } from 'events'; import React from 'react'; import { v4 as uuidv4 } from "uuid" const TableForm = ({ description, setDescription, quantity, setQuantity, price, setPrice, amount, setAmount }) => { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newItems = { id: uuidv4(), description: description, quantity: quantity, price: price, amount: amount } setDescription("") setQuantity("") setPrice("") setAmount("") setMaxListeners([]) } return ( <>
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setQuantity(e.target.value)} />
setPrice(e.target.value)} />
setAmount(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default TableForm;
